briefdescription.para: Address for WCF tripi endpoint with server listening.
Silverlight WCF proxy.
All trips loaded from server which are displayed in grid.
Currently selected trip which is displayed on map.
Logged user username given by asp in param tag.
Parameters from asp given by tag.
Descriptions of all interesting points represented by pinpoints on map.
Is description viewed or edited.
Additional constructor used when passing parameters from asp tag.
Prepares SilverlightShowcase. Connects to WCF, assign event handler methods.

memberdef.argsstring: (IList< Location > locations, Map map, int buffer)
memberdef.name: SetBestMapView

briefdescription.para: Adjusts map zoom level and map center to show all defined points at the same time preserving constant margin around them.

parameterdescription.para: List of points which should be visible at the same time

briefdescription.para: InitializeComponent.
Saves modyfied trip description after edit, toggles description TextBlock (edit and view) and Buttons (edit, save) visibility.
Displays TextBlock to edit trip description, toggles description TextBlock (edit and view) and Buttons (edit, save) visibility.
Callback from WCF function after description update is finished on server.
Toggles description Buttons (edit, save) visibility. Hides Buttons when mouse isn't focused on description TextBlock.

Toggles description Buttons (edit, save) visibility when mouse is focused on description TextBlock. Displays Buttons only if trip owner equals to logged user. Depending on description state (view or edit) toggles Buttons visibility.
Event hander method for changed trip by changing selection in grid. Toggles description TextBlock (edit and view) and Buttons (edit, save) visibility.
Callback from WCF function after all trips are downloaded from server.
Callback from WCF function after all points from tip are downloaded from server.
Draws polyline on map from given point list.

parameterdescription.para: List of points which will be drawed on map as a polyline

briefdescription.para: Views TextBlock containing Interesting point description after its pushpin was clicked.
Hides TextBlock containing Interesting point description after its close sign was clicked.
